Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • babel.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategorisedCard

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Simple object to represent a card.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String id,
    java.lang.String text,
    java.lang.String description,
    int maxTextLen)
     throws CardException
        Main Constructor
        Parameters:
        id - Key representing the text
        text - Actual string representation in the card-specific language
        description - Description/purpose of text - may be blank
        maxTextLen - Maximum length of text allowed, valid range ABS_MIN_TEXT_LENGTH to ABS_MAX_TEXT_LENGTH
        Throws:
        CardException - If input data is invalid.
